about_the_game:
Inspired by 80's classic slasher movies. Brought to you with unique twists.

Overcome evolving threats. You every move is stalked by the villain hunting you all. Can you and your 'party' going friends survive? Who will be the final girl? If there even is one.

Survive the mansion:

Interact with the other 'survivors' in this dire situation and unravel the mysteries of the maniac's mansion. Are they really friend or foe? When the chips are down and their number is up.. Your every moment is precious as once you're dead, you're really dead.

It's behind you...

Trapped, underpowered and unsuspecting. How will you defeat the villain? If you can? Navigate the mansion as things escalate based on what way - you - decide to tackle this 'horrifying' experience.. - The unique route you take will determine your fate.

Discover the truth behind the madness.

Explore the mansion and discover the sinister truth.

Features:

  • Story mode.
  • Single player.
  • Play as victim.
  • Npc companions.
  • Randomised elements.
  • Perma-death.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: dx11 compliant.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: Throw a party at a maniac's mansion - I'm sure that'll end well. RIP Party is a single player slasher horror game where you and other NPCs are being hunted. Explore & escape the creepy mansion, trade with the AI to get key items or collect them from their dead bodies - Featuring perma-death.
